cast.overview: In 1859, families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.
cast.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1

details.biography: Adriane McLean is a Jamaican-American actress, content creator, and producer known for Kevin Costner's Horizon An American Saga (2024), Brute 1976 (2025), Nickelodeon's The Really Loud House (2024), Apple TV+'s / Bonnie Hunt's Amber Brown, Hallmark's Holly & Ivy, OWN's Queen Sugar, as well as the beautiful and deadly
details.name: Adriane McLean
